Description: This backless gown is a show stopper. The beadwork and sequins cover just enough of the sheer bodice to be sexy while classy. The high slit in the front adds to the sex appeal of this gown. The halter neckline and open back make this gown stunning. The floor length train finishes this dress with sophistication.
